CustomField.description: A formula used for displaying the text value of the name of the destination on look up tables. Should be deprecated when the functionality of data tables is improved by Salesforce.
CustomField.formula:
PrimaryClientName__c + IF(ISBLANK( JointOwner__c),""," & " + JointOwnerName__c) + "'s " + IF( NOT(ISBLANK( DestinationLegacy__c )),
DestinationLegacy__r.Public_Provider_Name__r.Name + " " + DestinationLegacy__r.RecordType.Name, ProductName__c )
CustomField.label: Destination name
